attributes.action: TO HONOUR THE RESULT OF THE REFERENDUM BY LEAVING THE EU ON WTO RULES
attributes.additional_details:
Donald Tusk and other Politicians are using the recent petition signed by only 6m and the 1m marchers as leverage to reverse the democratic result of the referendum stating that the will of these people should be honoured.  What about honouring the 17.4m original voters?  Do we not count?  Were our votes wasted?  

Sign this petition to show the Government and EU that we still believe we need to leave on WTO rules
attributes.background: 17.4M Voted to leave the EU and be free of the chains, restrictions and outrageous fees.  We believe that the money currently paid to the EU could be used more effectively to strengthen the UK economy and build a much better, stronger and profitable Great Britain.
